noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 1396-2019 to designate the property at 1755 Bayview Avenue (Don Valley West - Ward 15) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: By-law 1396-2019 - To designate the property at 1755 Bayview Avenue as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing - 1755 Bayview Avenue
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
